summary:
Terminator gun with custom sounds
Custom modeled gun and quiver. New model for plasma bullet projectile as well 
Craft at any forge. 
This gun shots ammo automatically reloading every 7 to 10 shots
descriptionHtml:
Terminator gun with sound Fx 

Custom Model of gun and quiver (mudmermeisteR's idea of adding extra clips for the quiver). New model(nif) for plasma bullet projectile.. 

Craft at any forge. 
You will need one daedric heart and 3 ebony ingot. 
Plasma Bullets are craftable as well under steel category one filled black soul gem to craft ammo. 
This gun shots ammo automatically reloading every 7 to 10 shots. Thanks to J3X's auto fire scirpt
Crossbow animations 

Update 
 The ammo now will be crafted with 1 fire salt and 2 steel ingots. You do not have to have daedric smithing perk anymore. The gun is still going to be under the daedric category under a new name (Terminator Plasma Rifle)

Requirments 
Dawnguard 

Credits 
Kryptonian 
Dogtown1 
MurderMeisteR 
J3X 

Special Thanks 
Bethesda for making TES 5 Skyrim 
Terminator Fans 
The Nexus and Steam Communities 

Everyone Enjoy
author: KalEltheKryptonian and MurderMeisteR
